events.description: Pop Balloons is coming. Hit the balloon accurately to get rich rewards!
events.name: Pop Balloons.

events.description: Gold Rush challenge chance+2 during the event! Come challenge Gold Rush stages!
events.name: Gold Rush Chance+2.

events.description: Complete certain tasks and claim awesome rewards! (Daily Reset)
events.name: Task Rewards.

events.description: A new week begins, and it's time to start work again! Complete tasks and get great rewards!
events.name: Spring Benefit Task.

events.description: During the event, rare items are on sale with a special discount!
events.name: Spring Special Discount.

events.description: Use your Fragrant Garland to exchange for your gifts in Spring Exchange Store!
events.name: Spring Exchange Store.

events.description: Aircraft Game is here, take your fight into the sky, let's go!
events.name: Mini game-Aircraft.

events.description: Defeat the Ash clones for a specified number of times during the event to get Ash[Frag].
events.name: Team Battle to get Ash.

events.description: During the event, complete Choi XIV time-limited task to get rich rewards!
events.name: Choi XIV Time-limited Task.

events.description: During the event, complete Choi XIV Theme Task to get special Choi XIV gifts packs!
events.name: Choi XIV Theme Task.

events.description: Choi XIV gifts packs can be exchanged during the event. Don't miss it !
events.name: Gift Pack on Sale.

events.description: Recharge up to a specified amount in a single top-up to get valuable rewards!
events.name: Spring Single Recharge.

events.description: Kyo's Tower Drop is available during the event. Get rich rewards with your wit!
events.name: Kyo's Tower Drop.

events.description: Defeat the Nightmare Geese clones for a specified number of times during the event to get Nightmare Geese[Frag].
events.name: Team Battle to get Nightmare Geese.

events.description: During the event, you can get double rewards in Main Campaigns. (Daily Reset)
events.name: Campaign Rewards Doubled.

events.description: Double SP for the first 5 purchases during the event! (Daily Reset)
events.name: Double SP for first 5 purchases.

events.description: What treasures can you dig up from Ash Secret Garden? Come check it out!
events.name: Ash Secret Garden.

events.description: Mirage Challenge chance+2 during the event! Come and challenge Mirage Challenge stages!
events.name: Mirage Challenge Chance+2.

events.description: What are you waiting for, come challenge it now, be the first to get 2048!
events.name: 2048 Challenge.

events.description: Female Fighters Challenge chance+2 during the event! Come challenge Female Fighters Challenge stages!
events.name: Female Fighters Challenge Chance+2.

events.description: Accumulate certain ultimate trial points during the event and claim extra rewards! (Daily Reset)
events.name: Rewards for Trial Points.

events.description: Rare fashion for Transcendence K' is available during the event.
events.name: Fashion Pack.

events.description: 1 of 2 Lucky Draw is coming! Transcendence K' and Cruel Beauty Mature are waiting for you! Don't miss out!
events.name: 1 of 2 Lucky Draw.

events.description: Use Egg Machine during the event, and there is a chance for you to get Transcendence K' and Cruel Beauty Mature Awaken Weapon Frag, Tome, Badge and other rare items.
events.name: Weapons Egg Machine.

events.description: Draw a specified number of times in Lucky Draw during the event to get rich rare items!
events.name: Lucky Draw Rewards.

events.description: Spend a specified amount of Diamonds during the event and get awesome rewards!
events.name: Spend for Rewards.

events.description: Kensou eats Buns during the event. Play the game and claim rewards!
events.name: Mini game-Eat Buns.

events.description: Defeat the May Lee clones for a specified number of times during the event to get May Lee[Frag].
events.name: Team Battle to get May Lee.

events.description: Kula Defense War is available now! Test your speed and claim great rewards!
events.name: Kula Defense War.

events.description: EXP Rush Challenge chance+2 during the event! Come challenge EXP Rush Challenge stages!
events.name: EXP Rush Challenge Chance+2.

events.description: Opening hidden safes in Ultimate Trials for double Golds, come get it now! (Only doubled for free tries) (Daily Reset)
events.name: Double Gold in Trial Hidden Safe.

events.description: Rare fashion for Cruel Beauty Mature is available during the event.
events.name: Fashion Pack.

events.description: Train your superpower by charging the crystal ball and get rewards!

events.description: Gold Rush challenge chance+2 during the event! Come challenge Gold Rush stages!

events.description: A new week begins, and it's time to start work again! Complete tasks and get great rewards! (Daily Reset)

events.description: Open Equipment Chest during the event to get various items!

events.description: Weapons can be exchanged for "Equipment Frag" during the event, and you can exchange "Equipment Frag" for useful weapons.
events.name: Equipment Fragment Exchange.

events.description: During the event, 50% Off for first Openx10 of Equipment Chest every day! (Daily Reset)
events.name: First x10 Equipment Chest 50% Off.

events.description: During the event, Fighter's Aid Pack is available for limited time! Get it now!
events.name: Aid Pack Exchange.

events.description: Aid Doll Machine is available now! The Aid Souls of Mukai and Instinct Iori are waiting for you to get!
events.name: Aid Doll Machine.

events.description: During the event, draw a specified number of times in Gene Map Store to get rare items! Don't miss the chance!

events.description: Recharge 45 Diamonds for 1 hammer (max 10/day). Use 1 hammer and 10 Diamonds to smash eggs.
events.name: Egg Frenzy (Diamond).

events.description: Super Gold Scratcher is here, who knows what you may get!

events.description: Defeat the Athena 2002 UM clones for a specified number of times during the event to get Athena 2002 UM[Frag].
